title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: When using the Open Type dialog in JDK1.4, obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.) are displayed prominently.
OB: The obfuscated classes are currently displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: These obfuscated classes should be displayed less prominently in the Open Type dialog to improve visibility.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application. 
2. Open the Open Type dialog. 
3. Observe the prominent display of obfuscated classes.
